channel.description:
So, I thought of some ideas for a progression system. By that, I mean how many hours/games played (not ELO, looking at you Town of Salt)
Anyway, here are some of my ideas. Also, the link is for where I got some of my ideas down below.
Soldier: Armor: Soldier Armor(like spartan armor, 300 movie) Weapon: Trial by Arms(carries longsword and shield on back) Desc: Challenge thy enemy to a duel for his almighty. (Shows 2 guys fighting with swords, accuser gets slashed, but stabs enemy’s heart)
Senator: Armor: Comfy Garments(White toga, edged with purple) Weapon: Target Practice (Carries dual spears on back) Desc: thou are the Senate. Thy enemy did’n checketh thyself, so thou must wreck them. (Shows you and other legionaries assuming turtle formation(you behind legionnaire) then throws spears at guy, impaling him and killing him)
